mainText:
Dear Apple & Steve's family,

We are very sorry to hear about your lost. Our deepest sympathy, thoughts
and prayers are with you all. May Steve's soul rest in peace. Even though we
didn't know Steve personally but he had change the way we think of
technology. He is a genius and amazing human being. We love & respect him.
He will be always in our thoughts and always be part of our life.
author: Mariam and Aqeel
